trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> class is designed to be a container of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> classe é projetada para ser um contêiner de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> objetos.

trans-unit.source: It provides common services that handle event routing between designers, property windows, and other global objects.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece serviços comuns esse identificador de evento roteamento entre designers, janelas de propriedade e outros objetos globais.

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> is optional, but it is recommended if you intend to have several designer windows.
trans-unit.target: Usando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> é opcional, mas é recomendável se você pretende ter várias janelas de designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> class provides several design-time services automatically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> classe fornece vários serviços de tempo de design automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: You can override each of these services by replacing them in the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir cada um desses serviços, substituindo-os em protegido <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir um serviço, substituir o construtor, chamar base e faça as alterações por meio do método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: All services added to the service container that implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface are disposed when the design surface manager is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Todos os serviços adicionados ao contêiner de serviço que implementam o <xref:System.IDisposable> interface são descartados quando o Gerenciador de superfície de design é descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface as the default service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> classe fornece a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface como o serviço padrão.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> provides a global eventing mechanism for designer events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> Fornece um mecanismo de eventos globais para eventos de designer.

trans-unit.source: With this mechanism, an application is informed when a designer becomes active.
trans-unit.target: Com esse mecanismo, um aplicativo é informado quando um designer se torna ativo.

trans-unit.source: The service provides a collection of designers and a single place where global objects, such as the Properties window, can monitor selection change events.
trans-unit.target: O serviço fornece uma coleção de designers e um único local onde a objetos globais, como a janela de propriedades, podem monitorar a seleção de eventos de alteração.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo aos recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Exigem valores: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estados associados:

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: Um provedor de serviço pai.

trans-unit.source: Service requests are forwarded to this provider if they cannot be resolved by the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Solicitações de serviço são encaminhadas para esse provedor se elas não podem ser resolvidas pelo gerenciador de superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the active designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o designer ativo.

trans-unit.source: The active designer.
trans-unit.target: O designer ativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ActiveDesignSurface%2A> property should be set by the designer's user interface whenever a designer becomes the active window.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ActiveDesignSurface%2A> propriedade deve ser definida pela interface de usuário do designer sempre que um designer torna-se a janela ativa.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property works with the default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface to notify interested parties that a new designer is now active.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão dessa propriedade funciona com a implementação padrão da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface notificar partes interessadas que um novo designer agora está ativo.

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, you should override this property to notify your service appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Se você fornecer sua própria implementação de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, você deve substituir essa propriedade para notificar o serviço adequadamente.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that no designer is active.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser definida como `null`, indicando que nenhum designer está ativa.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the currently active designer changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o designer ativo atualmente é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de uma superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de uma superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: Um provedor de serviço pai.

trans-unit.source: A new merged service provider will be created that will first ask this provider for a service, and then delegate any failures to the design surface manager object.
trans-unit.target: Um novo provedor de serviços mesclado será criado que primeiro solicitará um serviço a esse provedor e, em seguida, delegará eventuais falhas ao objeto do gerenciador de superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: This merged provider will be passed into the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore(System.IServiceProvider)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse provedor mesclado será passado para o método <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore(System.IServiceProvider)" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de uma superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: If you want to conveniently add additional per-designer services, use the `parentProvider` parameter to provide a service provider for this design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja adicionar convenientemente serviços por designer adicionais, use o `parentProvider` parâmetro para fornecer um provedor de serviços para essa superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> method creates a merged service provider that can satisfy service requests from both the given service provider as well as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> itself.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> método cria um provedor de serviço mesclado que pode atender a solicitações de serviço do provedor de serviço em questão, bem como a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> em si.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> method then passes this service provider into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> método passa esse provedor de serviços para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> returns the design surface, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> method tries to obtain the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> retorna a superfície de design, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> método tenta obter o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>.

trans-unit.source: If it is present, and if it is the instance of the service that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> provided by default, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver presente, e se for a instância do serviço que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> fornecidos por padrão, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> método gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated> evento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentProvider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentProvider" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If an external implementation of the service was provided, it is the responsibility of the class that derives from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class to raise the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Se foi fornecida uma implementação externa do serviço, é responsabilidade da classe que deriva de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> classe para gerar o <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated" /> evento.

trans-unit.source: A service provider to pass to the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um provedor de serviços a ser passado para a superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: This is either an instance of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> or an object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />, and represents a merge between the service provider of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class and an externally passed provider.
trans-unit.target: Isso é uma instância de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> ou um objeto que implementa <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> e representa uma mesclagem entre o provedor de serviços da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> e um provedor passado externamente.

trans-unit.source: Implementation that creates the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A implementação que cria a superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> method is called by both <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> método é chamado por ambos <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: It is the implementation that actually creates the design surface.
trans-unit.target: É a implementação que cria, na verdade, a superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation just returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão retorna apenas um novo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.

trans-unit.source: You may override this method to provide a custom object that derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> class.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir esse método para fornecer um objeto personalizado que deriva de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer is created.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um designer é criado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um designer é descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of design surfaces.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de superfícies de design.

trans-unit.source: A collection of design surfaces that are currently hosted by the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de superfícies de design que são hospedadas no momento pelo Gerenciador de superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.DesignSurfaces%2A> property is implemented directly on top of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, so if you provide your own implementation of that service, this property uses your implementation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.DesignSurfaces%2A> propriedade é implementada diretamente na parte superior do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, portanto, se você fornecer sua própria implementação do serviço, esta propriedade usa sua implementação.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: O público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> método segue o padrão <xref:System.IDisposable> padrão.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método destrói o Gerenciador de superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement <xref:System.IDisposable> to also be disposed.
trans-unit.target: Ele também libera o contêiner de serviço, que faz com que todos os serviços que implementam <xref:System.IDisposable> também seja descartado.

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: A versão protegida desse método é `virtual` e segue o normal <xref:System.IDisposable> padrão.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> não tem qualquer código nativo para limpar, ele não tem um finalizador que chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, você deve adicionar um finalizador.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: O público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> método segue o padrão <xref:System.IDisposable> padrão.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método destrói o Gerenciador de superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement <xref:System.IDisposable> to also be disposed.
trans-unit.target: Ele também libera o contêiner de serviço, que faz com que todos os serviços que implementam <xref:System.IDisposable> também seja descartado.

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: A versão protegida desse método é `virtual` e segue o normal <xref:System.IDisposable> padrão.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> não tem qualquer código nativo para limpar, ele não tem um finalizador que chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, você deve adicionar um finalizador.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose()` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: The service type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a service in the design surface manager’s service container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um serviço no contêiner de serviço do gerenciador de superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements, or is a derived class of, the given service type; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the service does not exist in the service container.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o tipo de serviço fornecido ou é uma classe derivada dele ou então <see langword="null" />, se o serviço não existe no contêiner de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.GetService%2A> method forwards to any service provider that was given to the design surface manager at construction time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.GetService%2A> método encaminha em qualquer provedor de serviço que foi fornecida ao Gerenciador de superfície de design em tempo de construção.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the global selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a seleção global é alterada.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the active designer's selection of component set changes.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado quando a seleção ativa do designer do componente de conjunto de alterações.

trans-unit.source: This is mapped through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface.
trans-unit.target: Isso é mapeado por meio de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets the design surface manager's <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer" /> do gerenciador de superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The design surface manager's <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Do Gerenciador de superfície de design <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Classes inheriting from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> class can use this property to add and remove services.
trans-unit.target: Classes herdadas do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager" /> classe pode usar essa propriedade para adicionar e remover serviços.
